abstract: Apple introduced its second European sales partner in two days, revealing plans to sell the iPhone in Germany through T-Mobile, the wireless subsidiary of Deutsche Telekom.
snippet: Apple introduced its second European sales partner in two days, revealing plans to sell the iPhone in Germany through T-Mobile, the wireless subsidiary of Deutsche Telekom.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 19 — Apple introduced its second European sales partner in two days on Wednesday, revealing plans to sell the iPhone in Germany through T-Mobile, the wireless subsidiary of Deutsche Telekom.

headline.main: Deutsche Telekom to Offer iPhone in Germany
headline.print_headline: Apple, on a European Tour, Adds German iPhone Partner
